original_text: Go up to Hilkiah the high priest, that he may sum the silver which is brought into the house of the Lord, which the keepers of the door have gathered of the people:
korean_text: 너는 대제사장 힐기야에게 올라가서 백성이 여호와의 성전에 드린 은 곧 문 지킨 자가 수납한 은을 계산하여

sentences.original_text: Go up to Hilkiah the high priest
that he may sum the silver
which is brought into the house of the Lord
which the keepers of the door have gathered
